name: Prompt Save Reuse: ChatGPT & Gemini
description: Enhance your productivity with AI platforms by saving and reusing prompts. This extension allows you to save your input prompts and reuse them effortlessly in ChatGPT and Gemini. Single-click the extension icon to save or retrieve prompts, and double-click to append stored prompts with ease. Right-click for additional options such as clearing all saved data or visiting the GitHub page.
